description: A great leader in his day, Admiral Hanner is now retired. At the beginning of the series, he is under the care of his two daughters, http://anidb.net/ch7041 [Emi] and http://anidb.net/ch7040 [Yumi] Hanner. His first encounter with http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] is when he and his two daughters are rescued from a hostage situation. After Emi and Yumi are assigned to the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze], Adm. Hanner moves to a new home, but is visited by Tylor and his daughters from time to time. Hanner`s exploits on the galactic frontier have earned him respect even among the Raalgon.
name: Robert J. Hanner
